metadata.description:
Immerse yourself in a fascinating realm where illusion meets reality.
Interplay of light & shadow, where darkness meets brilliance & stillness meets motion.
Imagination soars & poetry unfolds
Enter the world of illusion where bubbles swirl and dance in a whirlpool.

Illusion is a hypnotic landscape loop animation created using p5js
metadata.name: Illusion #1/12
